tool_description: Workable, recruit people by creating beautiful job posts through an API
name: Workable
title: Workable

api_list.name: /candidates

parameters.name: candidate
parameters.description: Look at the example on the right hand side for all parameters

parameters.name: shortcode
parameters.description: The shortcode is a unique identifier for each jobs and can be seen by invoking  "/jobs"

utterances.utterance: Can you add a new candidate to the job with shortcode 5678? The candidate's name is John Doe, and he has 5 years of experience in software development.
Please create a candidate profile for Jane Smith applying to the position identified by shortcode 4321. She is a graphic designer with a strong portfolio.
I want to register a candidate named Michael Brown for the job with shortcode 8765. He specializes in data analysis and has a master's degree.
Add a candidate called Emily White to the job posting with shortcode 2345. She has experience in marketing and digital campaigns.
Could you please create a candidate entry for Robert Johnson applying for the job with shortcode 3456? He is an expert in cybersecurity.
I need to add a candidate named Laura Green for the job identified by shortcode 7890. She has a background in project management.
Please create a candidate profile for David Lee applying to the job with shortcode 6543. He is skilled in cloud computing and DevOps.
Add a candidate named Sarah Kim to the job posting with shortcode 9876. She has experience in UX/UI design and user research.
Can you register a candidate called James Wilson for the job with shortcode 3210? He is a seasoned financial analyst.
Please add a candidate named Olivia Martinez for the job identified by shortcode 1597. She has expertise in content writing and SEO.
